remarks: Membership in the span of a singleton.  All members are collinear with the generating vector.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: elspansn2 $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ B =/= 0h ) -> ( A e. ( span ` { B } ) <-> A = ( ( ( A .ih B ) / ( B .ih B ) ) .h B ) ) ) $.
